meanings.sent1: She rewashed the dishes carefully to make sure they were clean.
meanings.sent2: After the rain, the car was rewashed by the automatic car wash.
meanings.sent3: The cat rewashed its face with its paw, trying to look extra cute.
meanings.sent4: The memories of that day rewashed over her, bringing back all the emotions.
meanings.sent5: The teacher rewashed the concept in the students' minds until they understood it clearly.

meanings.sent1: He rewashed his favorite shirt before the big event.
meanings.sent2: The laundry machine rewashed the clothes that had a stubborn stain.
meanings.sent3: The robot rewashed the floor, but this time it added a little dance to its cleaning routine.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness rewashed the bitterness in his heart, making him believe in goodness again.
meanings.sent5: The rain rewashed the city streets, revealing their true colors under the grime.
